userStories.title: Configure Exam Profile
userStories.goal: define an Exam Profile with specific algorithm, scoring, and stopping parameters
userStories.benefit: configure the system for different exam types without code changes

acceptanceCriteria.title: Algorithm Selection
acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the Exam Profile configuration page
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can choose from: Item_Adaptive, Section_Adaptive, Linear_Fixed, LOFT and the selected algorithm is saved

acceptanceCriteria.title: Scoring Model Configuration
acceptanceCriteria.given: I have selected an algorithm type
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can choose from: Rasch, 1PL, 2PL, 3PL, or Classical and parameters are validated

acceptanceCriteria.title: Stopping Rules Definition
acceptanceCriteria.given: I am configuring an adaptive exam profile
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can set SEM threshold, min/max question counts, max duration with validation

userStories.title: Resume Interrupted Exam Session
userStories.goal: resume my exam exactly where I left off after a disconnection
userStories.benefit: don't lose progress or time due to technical issues

acceptanceCriteria.title: Session State Preservation
acceptanceCriteria.given: I am taking an exam and my connection drops
acceptanceCriteria.when: I reconnect and return to the exam
acceptanceCriteria.then: I am at the exact question with preserved answers and correct remaining time

acceptanceCriteria.title: Session Timeout Handling
acceptanceCriteria.given: my session has been inactive longer than allowed timeout
acceptanceCriteria.then: I see a clear expiry message and my partial results are saved

userStories.title: Navigate Exam Based on Profile Rules
userStories.goal: navigate through questions according to the exam's navigation rules
userStories.benefit: exam experience matches the configured exam type

acceptanceCriteria.title: Unidirectional Navigation (CAT Mode)
acceptanceCriteria.given: the exam profile has navigation: unidirectional
acceptanceCriteria.then: I cannot go back and Previous button is hidden/disabled

acceptanceCriteria.title: Bidirectional Navigation (Review Mode)
acceptanceCriteria.given: the exam profile has navigation: bidirectional
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can navigate forward/backward, flag questions, and see question map
